findings.title: Mint not allowed yet
findings.description: The mint function has a require statement to check if minting is allowed, but it can be toggled by the contract owner.

findings.title: All minted
findings.description: The total supply of NFTs has been reached, preventing further minting.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The contract allows an unauthorized user to upgrade the script.

findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: Active contract ownership identified which creates a risk of rug pull scams and centralization related risks are higher than common smart contract vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Unsecured minting of NFTs
findings.description: The smart contract owner can mint NFTs and toggle mint status without any restrictions.
